alert.note: Alert for Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ware and northwestern Charlton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Stephen Foster State Park, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Ware and northwestern Charlton Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
